alert.note: Alert for Chicot (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 25 at 8:58PM CDT until June 26 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM CDT FOR CHICOT...ASHLEY...SOUTHWESTERN SUNFLOWER...WASHINGTON AND BOLIVAR COUNTIES... At 857 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Beulah to near Mcmillan Corner to Fountain Hill, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Lake Village and Mcmillan Corner around 905 PM CDT. Cleveland, Boyle and Chicot Junction around 915 PM CDT. Shaw, Avon, Berlin and Wayside around 920 PM CDT. Parkdale around 925 PM CDT. Wilmot and Holly Ridge around 930 PM CDT. Glen Allan around 935 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Blanchton and Halley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
